successes.title: Helgray Silverstone - The 60's Racing Chronograph Watch
successes.description: A watch inspired by the racing chronographs of the 1960's. At its heart is a hybrid mechanical-quartz movement made in Japan.

Pledges.description: POLE POSITION - Receive one (1) Helgray Silverstone watch (save $120 off retail). Choose your color at the end of the project.
RUNNER UP - Receive one (1) Helgray Silverstone watch (save $100 off retail). Choose your color at the end of the project.
THIRD PLACE - Receive one (1) Helgray Silverstone watch (save $70 off retail). Choose your color at the end of the project.
THE DUEL - Receive two (2) Helgray Silverstone watches of your choice. Save a total of $249 off retail. Choose your colors at the end of the project. Also enjoy FREE SHIPPING worldwide!
THE LATE DUEL - Receive two (2) Helgray Silverstone watches of your choice. Save a total of $219 off retail. Choose your colors at the end of the project. Also enjoy FREE SHIPPING worldwide!
THE TRIO - Receive three (3) Helgray Silverstone watches of your choice. Save a total of $398 off retail. Choose your colors at the end of the project. Also enjoy FREE SHIPPING worldwide!
ALL WHEEL DRIVE - Receive four (4) Helgray Silverstone watches of your choice. Save a total of $547 off retail. Choose your colors at the end of the project. Also enjoy FREE SHIPPING worldwide!
